articles.title: Solar storm: Aurora puts the dazzling show in sky over North America | Oneindia News *news - Oneindia News
articles.description: Aurora puts a stunning show in the sky after a solar storm hits the Earth. Aurora is a natural light display in Earth's sky. Watch the video to know more.#Au...

articles.title: AL beats NL for ninth straight time, Stanton claims MVP at 2022 MLB All-Star Game - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Giancarlo Stanton homered in his Dodger Stadium homecoming, Byron Buxton followed with another drive and the American League won its ninth straight All-Star Game, beating the National League 3-2 on Tuesday night.
articles.content: LOS ANGELES -- Giancarlo Stanton homered in his Dodger Stadium homecoming, Byron Buxton followed with another drive and the American League won its ninth straight All-Star Game, beating the National … [+8815 chars]
